title: Best spring sales 2021: deals from Best Buy, Home Depot, Walmart, and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Spring sales on TVs, mattresses, furniture, laptops, and more
article: Spring is officially here, and that means not only warmer weather but also a slew of sales from your favorite retailers like Walmart, Home Depot, Best Buy, and more. It's the perfect opportunity to find incredible deals on everything from mattresses, furniture, and vacuums, to TVs, laptops, appliances, and more. Some of our top spring deals include the best-selling AirPods Pro marked down $219 (was $249), a massive $120 discount on the powerful Dell XPS 13 laptop, and this 55-inch 4K TV on sale for just $329.99. If you're interested in outdoor items, Home Depot and Lowe's are offering incredible discounts on patio furniture, and you can find fantastic mattress bargains with sitewide savings and free accessories from online brands like Nectar and DreamCloud. See more of the best spring bargains below, and make sure to bookmark this page as we'll be updating it with all the best deals throughout the 2021 spring sales event.
